meanings.definition: The state or condition of being monophagous.
meanings.sent1: Her monophagies led to a limited diet of only one type of food.
meanings.sent2: The monophagies of the koala make it mainly eat eucalyptus leaves.
meanings.sent3: His monophagies were so extreme that he only ate carrots for a whole month.
meanings.sent4: The monophagies of the picky eater were compared to a panda's preference for bamboo.
meanings.sent5: The doctor explained the dangers of monophagies through a simple analogy with a car needing different fuels to run smoothly.

meanings.definition: The act or practice of consuming only one type of food.
meanings.sent1: Monophagies can sometimes lead to nutritional deficiencies.
meanings.sent2: The bear's monophagies made it seek out only salmon in the river.
meanings.sent3: The monophagies of the toddler were evident as he refused all foods except bananas.
meanings.sent4: Her monophagies were like a broken record, always choosing the same meal every day.
meanings.sent5: The consequences of monophagies were illustrated through a story of a bird that only ate one type of seed and became weak.
